items.description: Schema definition as defined in RFC 7643 Section 7
Schema attribute definition as defined in RFC 7643 Section 7

canonicalValues.description: Suggested canonical values for the attribute

caseExact.description: Indicates if the attribute is case-sensitive

multiValued.description: Indicates if the attribute is multi-valued

mutability.description: Indicates when the attribute value can be modified

referenceTypes.description: For reference attributes, the SCIM resource types that may be referenced

required.description: Indicates if the attribute is required

returned.description: Indicates when the attribute is returned

items.title: SchemaAttribute

id.description: The unique URI of the schema

meta.description: Resource metadata as defined in RFC 7643 Section 3.1

created.description: The timestamp when the resource was created

lastModified.description: The timestamp when the resource was last modified

resourceType.description: The name of the resource type (e.g., User, Group)

version.description:
The version of the resource. Used for ETag-based versioning.
Weak ETags are prefixed with W/

meta.title: ResourceMetadata

items.title: SchemaDefinition

itemsPerPage.description: The number of resources returned in the current page
itemsPerPage.title: itemsPerPage

startIndex.description: The 1-based index of the first result in the current set of results
startIndex.title: startIndex

totalResults.description: The total number of results matching the query
totalResults.title: totalResults

schema.description: Error response as defined in RFC 7644 Section 3.12

status.description: The HTTP status code expressed as a JSON string

schema.title: ErrorResponse

401.description: Authorization failure. The authorization header is invalid or missing

schema.description: Error response as defined in RFC 7644 Section 3.12

status.description: The HTTP status code expressed as a JSON string

schema.title: ErrorResponse
